actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 14.
name: Patty Shwartz
nominee: Patty Shwartz, of New Jersey, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Third Circuit
position: United States Circuit Judge for the Third Circuit
